titles.title: Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2025
Regulation A+ Improvement Act of 2025
To amend the Securities Act of 1933 with respect to small company capital formation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 28 - 23.
